Titles.eng: Mars Daybreak
Titles.jpn: 絢爛舞踏祭ザ･マーズ･デイブレイク

Summaries.eng:
Life on Mars is hard for those who live there. A worsening economy means work is scarce and affordable food even more so. Still, Gram River and his friends try to get by.

Fate sets its eyes on Gram one day, though. In the wrong place at the wrong time, Gram finds himself aboard the Ship of Aurora, the most notorious pirate ship in all the oceans of Mars. Piloting a custom RB (Round Buckler), Gram finds himself a place among the Aurora's crew. Soon, he even finds himself enjoying the new adventure!

Titles.eng: Attack! Daybreak Ship!
Titles.jpn: 襲撃! 夜明けの船

Summaries.eng: Economy is bad on Mars and Gram has lost his job again today. Then his childhood friend Vess appears before him...

Titles.eng: Furious Attack! Round Buckler!
Titles.jpn: 猛攻! ラウンドバックラー

Summaries.eng: Gram becomes crew member of the Aurora. But because of his carelessness, the Aurora is attacked by Round Bucklers.

Titles.eng: Jr. Dream Deployment!
Titles.jpn: ショウ 憧れの出撃!

Summaries.eng: Junior takes an RB out without permission and is caught by the Earth Forces. Vess begs Gram to leave the pirate's life.

Titles.eng: Contact! Gram, Vess and the Submarine
Titles.jpn: 接触! グラムとベスと潜水艦

Summaries.eng: The Aurora is being repaired before departure. Gram goes to town to make his farewells but he comes across Vess again!

Titles.eng: Anna's Struggle! The Fleet of our Dreams
Titles.jpn: アンナ奮闘! 夢の我が艦隊

Summaries.eng: The granddaughter of Earth's president Enora has been kidnapped. The Aurora starts to be hunted down for it by error!

Titles.eng: Ah! Revolution of Glory and Passion!?
Titles.jpn: 嗚呼! 栄光と情熱の革命よ!

Summaries.eng: The crew has to capture the hit-and-run ship that damaged the Aurora. But hidden weapons are found during the chase.

Titles.eng: Friend or Foe!? The Mercenary Pirate
Titles.jpn: 敵か味方か!? 傭兵海賊

Summaries.eng: Gram is saved by a man with an artificial arm who claims to be an acquaintance of Elizabeth, the Captain of the Aurora.

Titles.eng: Gorgeous! Extravagant Ball
Titles.jpn: 絢爛! 豪華舞踏会

Summaries.eng: The Aurora crew boards on a luxury ship of Earth nationality where Martian laws do not apply. Enemies happen to gather.

Titles.eng: Thump! Swimsuit-riddled Bathhouse
Titles.jpn: ドキッ! 水着だらけの大銭湯

Summaries.eng: The Aurora has to face a giant creature. Gram attempts to fight it with his RB, to prevent the Aurora from sinking.

Titles.eng: Sightsee! Romance of the First Martian Immigrant
Titles.jpn: 観光! 火星先住移民のロマン

Summaries.eng: Gram helps an old woman but this drags him into an unexpected situation. What's the real purpose of the old woman?

Titles.eng: Break Through! Federation Trap
Titles.jpn: 突破せよ! 地球軍包囲網

Summaries.eng: The Earth Forces have tracked down the Aurora that manages to escape anyway. But Vess finds a way to trace them.

Titles.eng: Bizarre! The Ghost Ship Drift Zone
Titles.jpn: 怪奇! 幽霊船漂流地帯

Summaries.eng: A ship of unknown origin is detected. Then weird things start to happen in the Aurora. Is this due to a Ghost Pirate?

Titles.eng: Daring, Fearless! Bride on the Bottom of the Ocean
Titles.jpn: 大胆不敵! 海底の花よめ

Summaries.eng: The Aurora saves a woman in a wedding dress, who is after her fiancé. She mistakes one of the crew as her loved one...

Titles.eng: Big Jailbreak! Beyond Love and Passion
Titles.jpn: 大脱獄! 愛と情熱の果てに

Summaries.eng: Vess deserts the flagship and comes to defy Gram, but she has hard times. Then Gram's RB gets immobilized by chance!

Titles.eng: The Enemy Under Eyes! Dive Deep, Quietly
Titles.jpn: 眼下の敵! 深く静かに潜航せよ

Summaries.eng: Vess is still after the Aurora but she is attacked by pirates. Will she be able to get out of this difficult situation?

Titles.eng: Enter! Hakubutsu Ship, Eichi's Castle!
Titles.jpn: 潜入! 博物都市船、叡智の城

Summaries.eng: The Aurora seeks for a clue to resolve the mystery of the Box of Guidance. But the job is harder than expected.

Titles.eng: Rebellion! The Universe's Greatest Pilot!
Titles.jpn: 叛乱! 宇宙最強の海賊

Summaries.eng: Yagami revolts against Elizabeth on the Box of Guidance and occupies the Aurora. Enora undertakes the Captain's rescue.

Titles.eng: Marriage proposal to the Captain!? The Man who is called
Titles.jpn: 船長に求婚!? ドクターと呼ばれた男

Summaries.eng: The Aurora crew meets "Doctor", a sworn friend of Captain Elizabeth. There, a ship of the Earth Forces attacks them...

Titles.eng: Fly, Kibougou! Over that Gate!
Titles.jpn: 翔べ希望号! あの門を越えて

Summaries.eng: As Gram tries to break through a strategic point of the Earth Forces, an unknown RB appears that runs alongside him.

Titles.eng: Duel! Gram and Vess
Titles.jpn: 果たし合い! グラムとベス

Summaries.eng: Vess sends a letter of challenge to Gram. When the two face each other, fate makes the duel take an unexpected turn...

Titles.eng: Good-bye My Friend! A Man's Dream Lasts Forever
Titles.jpn: さらば友よ! 男の夢は永遠に

Summaries.eng: Junior is appointed as a diver at last, for the new RB. Meanwhile, Yagami decides to go back to his original mission.

Titles.eng: Discovery! Sanctuary of the Olympus treasure legend
Titles.jpn: 発見! オリンポス秘宝伝説の聖地

Summaries.eng: Elizabeth makes plans to defeat Earth Forces and Kubernes and enables the Aurora to reach the cavern of the treasure...

Titles.eng: God`s Stone! Free For All Battle
Titles.jpn: 神の石! 前人未踏の争奪戦

Summaries.eng: The Aurora makes its way to the cavern thanks to the Daybreak Attack. The owner of the Aurora surprisingly appears.

Titles.eng: Earth Forces Attack! The Ship of Aurora`s Break-through Tactic
Titles.jpn: 地球軍強襲! 夜明けの船突入作戦

Summaries.eng: At the exit of the cavern, the Earth Forces ambush the Aurora, that has to surrender. But Gram won't accept it.

Titles.eng: Run, Gram! Rescueing the Captured Comrades
Titles.jpn: 駆けろグラム! 囚われの仲間を救え!!

Summaries.eng: Vess and Enora manage to come back to Mars. With Gram, they start the operations to rescue the Aurora crew.

Titles.eng: The Dawn of Mars! Mars Daybreak
Titles.jpn: 火星の夜明け! マーズ・デイブレイク

Summaries.eng: The Aurora crew is rescued with the help of Vess, Yagami and a third ally. Captain Elizabeth is burning with anger…
